Key Match Events: Ferran Torres scored the only goal of the match in the 13th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Spain coach Luis de la Fuente made 10 changes to the side that began the victory over reigning champions Italy
Post-Match Reflections: Spain offered further evidence of their Euro 2024 title credentials
Miscellaneous Highlights: Albania's defeat also had an impact elsewhere, meaning France, Netherlands and England progressed to the next round before their final group matches
Others: Albania finished bottom of the group with one point
